1.name: Documents
1.desc: Printed, typed or written matter including leaflets, pamphlets, certificates etc., which are not subject to import duties and taxes, restrictions and prohibitions.

2.name: Low value non-dutiable consignments
2.desc: Imported consignments/items/goods in respect of which Customs duties and other taxes are waived as they are below a value determined by the Customs administration.

3.name: Low value dutiable consignments
3.desc: Imported consignments/items/goods in respect of which Customs duties and other taxes are payable are below a certain amount as determined by the Customs administration.

4.name: High value consignments
4.desc: Imported consignments/items/goods which are determined as having a value above a certain amount fixed by the Customs administration, which may or may not attract duties and taxes.

5.name: Other non-containerized
5.desc: Non-containerized cargo which cannot be categorized by any of the other nature of cargo code.

6.name: Vehicles
6.desc: Vehicles which are not stowed in containers.

7.name: Roll-on roll-off
7.desc: Cargo transported or to be transported on roll-on roll- off vessels and which is transportable on its own wheels or stowed on special heavy duty trailers.

9.name: Containerized
9.desc: Cargo stowed or to be stowed in a container.

10.name: Breakbulk
10.desc: Non-containerized cargo stowed in vessels' holds.

11.name: Hazardous cargo
11.desc: Cargo with dangerous properties, according to appropriate dangerous goods regulations.

12.name: General cargo
12.desc: Cargo of a general nature, not otherwise specified.

14.name: Temperature controlled cargo
14.desc: Cargo transported under specified temperature conditions.

19.name: Obnoxious
19.desc: Cargo that is objectionable to human senses.

20.name: Out of gauge
20.desc: Cargo that has at least one non-standard dimension.

21.name: Household goods and personal effects
21.desc: Cargo consisting of household goods and personal effects.
